title: Random Picker
description: Paste your participant list and pick winners instantly with one click.

placeholder.items:
Enter one item per line
Example: Alice
Bob
Charlie

helper.items: Separate items with commas or new lines.
helper.count: The number of winners cannot exceed the total items.

error.empty: Please enter at least one item.
error.invalidCount: Enter a winner count of 1 or more.
error.tooMany: You can pick up to {{count}} winners.

openGraph.title: Random Picker
openGraph.description: Use the random picker to draw winners from a list. Add names separated by commas or new lines, set the number of winners, and pick instantly.
